titles.title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to designate Edmonson, Hart, and Metcalfe Counties, Kentucky, as part of the Appalachian region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Provisions of Measure Incorporated into H.R. 2501.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/27/2001--Introduced. Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1985 to add Edmonson, Hart, and Metcalfe Counties, Kentucky, to the Appalachian region.
